page.title: 01A review of the area
page.content: This area of{East Sussex}is generally {wooded}and rural.It is crossed from North to South by the{A22}and from East to West by the{A272}with a new Uckfield{By-pass}under construction passing through from the{A26}at Five Ash Down to Black Down.There are two villages,the smaller{Five Ash Down}and {Maresfield.There are few amenities {locally,Uckfield}to the South being closest for shopping,entertainment, leisure and the secondary school. {Maresfield}has a Primary School,pub,a few shops,a church and a developing leisure centre which is a branch of the Uckfield leisure centre.The village grew from the{Wealden Iron {Industry}around the{crossroads.Public {transport}available on main roads is {buses}only,but the majority of residents use{private cars}to travel to work,school,shopping entertainment
